title: I DID IT, I FINALLY HIT GOLD!!!!!!!!!!!
body:
I've been playing this game since season 2, and finally reached gold tier!

I would like to start by thanking my parents, whose constant nagging to stop playing at 3 am only inspired me to queue for one more game. I would also like to thank my three brothers, whose taunts about how big of a nerd I am will finally be silenced when they realized just how awesome I am for hitting gold. Finally I would like to thank my girlfriend, whose pleas for me to "stop playing fucking video games and pay attention to me" have fallen on deaf ears for three years.  Yes I am awesome, you may all begin worshiping me now.

replies.body: If you don't make plat now your life will be meaningless.  God speed friend.

You will be seeing another thread in season 12 titled "I DID IT, I FINALLY HIT PLATINUM!!!!!!!!!!!"


Just you wait.

**3000 years later...**

"HOLY SHIT GUYS I HIT CHALLENGER!!!!!!

...um... guys?"

[dead silence]
Girlfriend is still nagging for him to stop.

Good luck. I've been playing for about a year and a half, have made it up to gold 2 this season but can't seem to get past gold 3-2 (keep dropping, going back up, dropping). I really want to hit plat but this seems to keep happening: 

"Nice, 5 wins in a row I'm carrying a lot, oh I made it into my series again. 2 out 3 should be easy." Queue people trolling/afking/playing well below what the tier would imply. Every series. It make you dread going into series even after win streaks. Sure, it's "bad luck" when that happens. But it's also just a really terrible system that doesn't even make sense mathematically, it requires you to have 66% win rate (much higher than what it takes to gradually climb) in a course of 3 games which is too small a sample to show any kind of trend. And if you fail it, it drops you way down again.

Basically, climbing up the ladder requires skill, but suddenly you hit your series and it's all about luck. I don't know why you would design a competitive ladder like that.
hahaha. +1
Congrats! :D

OMG two life goals completed in two days!

Get to gold, check

Have a Red respond to one of my posts, check
grats but...you have some pretty limited life goals if those are on the list
Limited life goals????? I'll have you know that my final life goal is to eat cake today! Whose life goals are limited now?!?!?!?!?
Now you can retire and stream for money. People will pay you to play, women will pay _you_ to play with them, and Faker will want to be you. Congratulations, buddy.
As someone currently in my Silver promos, congrats! I only hope to one day aspire to your Golden status.
YAY!! Another one!!!
congratulations...however  Boobs greater than Gold V...food for thought
Gold IV though...
I'm married, someone has been lying to you.
unless you are the op posting on another account...i dont think so. but thank you for the unsolicited information, we were all wondering about your marital status...whoever you are (-_-)
i was not claiming to be OP. Just a general fact about married life/ boobs are fun but not the best thing ever.
yes but still greater than gold v

Congrats. My wife, "Hey, quit playing games." Me, "Uh, why? Kinda mid..." Wifey, "You wanna tap this or what?" Me: out of clothes and in the bedroom in less than the time it takes for LB to double distort.

Nice work mate, keep it up.
Pre or Post nerf?
Probably post
And he finishes his job before she can do it again.

''goldbitches.jpg''

LOL 

Nice job though =)
congrats, if only i was this motivated to play ranked lol
Congrats mate, now you can start living! ;)
Grats, I hate you.
you have teemo in your name, hypocrite

You will soon discover the truth:

Gold is highly polished bronze.
Platinum is a very thin layer of platinum coated onto silver.
Diamond is compacted coal tier of unrankeds.
*checks account tomorrow* Silver I 75LP
Congratz you have pixel gold border

Yeah but I worked damn hard for that pixel border. It is impossible to ruin how happy I am right now (that will probably come in a few years when I realize I wasted the best years of my life playing a video game, but hell, that is a-few-years-from-now-me's problem :D)

inb4 gold is the true elo hell.  Everyone just thinks they know what to do.  And once you hit plat, people REALLY think they know what to do. :c

Congratz either way! enjoy ze boarder. :D
and when you reach plat, plat becomes the new elo hell. If you get Diamond, that'll be the news ELO hell. If you hit dia1, then that's elo hell.

i was playing since the end of season 1 (didnt rank till season 2) and only got gold in season 4. started this season in bronze 1, climbed all the way back up. i know your pain man. ladders are tricky things.
Congratulations! Now you can evolve trinkets!

I started playing in S4 not knowing the difference between AD and AP and was placed in Bronze 4. Made it to almost Gold 4 end of season. The lack of difference between playing in Bronze and Gold made me quite depressed and it is just as hard and annoying to climb. I hoped that I would get less idiots in my games by climbing. God was I wrong. I somewhat lost my drive to climb. whatever I do, I end up relying on random idiots for my wins. Meh.
*golf claps*
you are amazing :)
I laughed a tad bit when i saw goldbitches.jpg
congratz{{summoner:31}}

awww thats adorable
-rubs head-
good for you kiddo, keep climbing.

"goldbitches.jpg"

Nice name.

Hey same! I started season 2. I got gold last season, and plat in the preseason.
Congrats to u!
now get diamond cuz its easy as fuck

OOOOOOOOMMMMMM worship our lord and god pro crastinat0r for reaching the holy gold medal and getting a shiny skin in the end of the season unless he fucks up royally OOOOOOOOOMMMMMM
http://www.fpcallen.org/images//worship.png
Me too! Hit gold last week on the 5th.
Congratulations! Enjoy your achievement being made meaningless by obnoxious elitist pricks acting like being Gold is no better than being Bronze V.

I already know my achievement IS meaningless in an objective sense (pixels border and pretty skin) but I am still proud of it. Obnoxious elitist pricks pointing it out doesn't ruin anything it for me :D.
